pages.text: Kuo(cool)BaoContact InformationEmail:bkcsplayer@gmail.comPhone：204-698-3128Language EducationDiploma in AutomotiveFanshawe College - London, ONAugust 2014 to September 2015 Work Experience Lube TechnicianHeninger Toyota - Calgary, AB-August 2018 to Present Do Maintains service for Toyota Vehicle make recommendations for further service on vehicles based on inspections. check electrical components on vehicles, such as testing the horn, lights, wipers and so on. replace filters in the engine, including air filters and oil filters. check vehicle tires and test the air pressure. perform vehicle inspections that include examining and testing multiple points of interest on the vehicle, and checking thoroughly for oil leaks. This includes checking all fluid levels in the vehicle, including windshield washing liquid. key Holder& Liquor Store ClerkLiquor central (downtown)-May 2018-December 2018 Greeted customers in professional manner and answered any questions regarding products, content, use and price Operated computerized cash register system to process sales data Received and verified shipments; inspected and documented freight damages; determined stock needs, coded merchandise and arranged shelf and floor displays Responsible for retail and warehouse functions Automotive Apprentice TechnicianUnder The Hood Auto Setvice - Winnipeg, MB-February 2016 to April 2018 Vehicle inspection Wheel alignment Assisted the mechanic as needed Tire repair, replacement and balancing Oil changes Removed and replaced tires, shocks, struts, and brakes HVAC repair Replaced gaskets and oil seals Assisted in removed and re-installed engines and transmissions Routine maintenance procedures Seasonal maintenance check Diagnosis of issues with automotive scan tools Car Detailer(part-time)Enterprise Car-rental - Winnipeg, MB-May 2017 to January 2018 Clean vehicle exterior by hand, brush or by operating washing equipment Polish, dry and clean vehicle windshields, windows, lights, mats and exterior body, by hand Vacuum, shampoo, add air freshener and clean vehicle interior Perform basic maintenance check Verify appropriate stickers are attached to vehicle responsible for maintaining an inventory of cleaning supplies assist with local automobile deliveries Perform miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned Service Advisor(part-time)Auroro immigration company - Winnipeg, MB-August 2016 to September 2017 Contac the customer either on the phone or at the front counter. Handle customer service complaints, issues, requests and questions. Keep customer updated as needed. Create documents for customers and notify customers of official documents that need to be prepared Preparation and explanation of the work to the customer. Volunteer ExperiencesCivic Auto auto service - Winnipeg, MB-September 2015 to February 2016 Cleaned the auto shop and assisted the mechanic as needed Completed oil changes, checked and filled fluids Tire repair, replacement and balancing

posts.title: miniapp
posts.excerpt: Wechat miniapp截至目前为止小程序，开发到了现在的样子，利用腾讯自带的云开发功能，可以实现，云端的数据操作，然后在前段显示出来，例如读取 顾客维护信息，顾客注册车辆，云端新闻，瀑布流布局，目前还有写问题没有解决，那就是如何实现登陆认证，并且全局调用userinfo这个重要的参数，进而好去实现，根据userinfo这个 属性，唯一且针对的从 数据库的池子里拿走带有这个标签的数据，例如车辆信息以及对应的保养信息，
posts.text: Wechat miniapp截至目前为止小程序，开发到了现在的样子，利用腾讯自带的云开发功能，可以实现，云端的数据操作，然后在前段显示出来，例如读取 顾客维护信息，顾客注册车辆，云端新闻，瀑布流布局，目前还有写问题没有解决，那就是如何实现登陆认证，并且全局调用userinfo这个重要的参数，进而好去实现，根据userinfo这个 属性，唯一且针对的从 数据库的池子里拿走带有这个标签的数据，例如车辆信息以及对应的保养信息， 使用open_id Wechat miniapp我的miniapp 点击vinnumber 获取对应的详细的维修保养记录， 和todos 云代办 里点击 查看待办事项是一样的原理，查询

posts.title: Life in Heninger
posts.text: 2018年的8月份，我正式的来到Heninger Toyota上班，作为一个 quick lube service technician。此时距离我来卡尔加里已经有一个月了，这个城市非常的美丽，城市间的路往往也都是盘山交错，整个城市的布局也是错落有致，对于我这种生活在平原上的人来说，很是稀奇，这里的气候野外环境，也同我的家乡一样，因为具有同一个纬度。

posts.title: Life in Calgary
posts.text: 卡尔加里初次来到卡尔加里是在夏末的一天，

posts.title: Cool Mini App
posts.excerpt: 这里是我第一次使用Hexo搭建个人博客，目前的进行到把我创建的这个项目连接到github上以便于达到一个开放的目的。Mini-app进行的位置目前需要对当前版本的几个bug进行修改，对文章进行一些内容的更新。短期目标最近希望在Mini-app里面添加一个blog系统，以便进行之后的项目如何在自己的发布的文章里面添加图片呢？？
posts.text: 这里是我第一次使用Hexo搭建个人博客，目前的进行到把我创建的这个项目连接到github上以便于达到一个开放的目的。Mini-app进行的位置目前需要对当前版本的几个bug进行修改，对文章进行一些内容的更新。短期目标最近希望在Mini-app里面添加一个blog系统，以便进行之后的项目如何在自己的发布的文章里面添加图片呢？？ 还在尝试中，目前不清楚有那些方法 网站中的音乐是如何添加的呢？我有看到在 themes/diaspora 的主配置文件有mp3 的格式，但是里面的地址让我觉得有些奇怪，不知道是不是 xx云存储里的 文件。有待考察 Hexo ConfigurationDocs: http://zespia.tw/hexo/docs/configure.htmlSource: https://github.com/tommy351/hexo/Site 这里的配置，哪项配置反映在哪里，可以参考我的博客title: My Blog #博客名subtitle: to be continued… #副标题description: My blog #给搜索引擎看的，对网站的描述，可以自定义author: Yourname #作者，在博客底部可以看到email: yourname@yourmail.com #你的联系邮箱language: zh-CN #中文。如果不填则默认英文 URL #这项暂不配置，绑定域名后，欲创建sitemap.xml需要配置该项If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as ‘http://yoursite.com/child' and root as ‘/child/‘url: http://yoursite.comroot: /permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/tag_dir: tagsarchive_dir: archivescategory_dir: categories Writing 文章布局、写作格式的定义，不修改new_post_name: :title.md # File name of new postsdefault_layout: postauto_spacing: false # Add spaces between asian characters and western characterstitlecase: false # Transform title into titlecasemax_open_file: 100filename_case: 0highlight: enable: true backtick_code_block: true line_number: true tab_replace: Category & Tagdefault_category: uncategorizedcategory_map:tag_map: Archives 默认值为2，这里都修改为1，相应页面就只会列出标题，而非全文2: Enable pagination1: Disable pagination0: Fully Disablearchive: 1category: 1tag: 1 Server 不修改Hexo uses Connect as a serverYou can customize the logger format as defined inhttp://www.senchalabs.org/connect/logger.htmlport: 4000logger: falselogger_format: Date / Time format 日期格式，可以修改成自己喜欢的格式Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display dateYou can customize the date format as defined inhttp://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/date_format: YYYY-M-Dtime_format: H:mm:ss Pagination 每页显示文章数，可以自定义，贴主设置的是10Set per_page to 0 to disable paginationper_page: 10pagination_dir: page Disqus Disqus插件，我们会替换成“多说”，不修改disqus_shortname: Extensions 这里配置站点所用主题和插件，暂时默认Plugins: https://github.com/tommy351/hexo/wiki/PluginsThemes: https://github.com/tommy351/hexo/wiki/Themestheme: landscapeexclude_generator:plugins: hexo-generator-feed hexo-generator-sitemap Deployment 站点部署到github要配置Docs: http://zespia.tw/hexo/docs/deploy.htmldeploy: type: git repository: branch: master

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
